## LoaderOptions.shading property

When viewing b3dm (mesh) tiles, which type of [Shading](./loader-3d-tiles.shading.md) is used - Default: `Shading.FlatTexture`

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
shading?: Shading;
```
